languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, абордажные команды рвутся в бой! Генератор {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Поля Геллера{/g} "Бессердечного" приказал долго жить, так что в варп им теперь не нырнуть, да и главный двигатель мы им подпалили — не уйдет посудина. Штурмовать корабль можно хоть сейчас, но по опыту скажу — абордаж пройдет легче, если нанести еще пару-тройку прицельных ударов. Может, сплющим немного переборки вместе с еретиками, чтобы упростить вам бой, Лорд-капитан?"

"Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g} generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket isn't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, абордажные команды рвутся в бой! Генератор {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Поля Геллера{/g} "Бессердечного" приказал долго жить, так что в варп им теперь не нырнуть, да и главный двигатель мы им подпалили — не уйдет посудина. Может, сплющим немного переборки вместе с еретиками, чтобы упростить вам бой, Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's Gellar Field generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket ain't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"

languages.text: «¡Lord Capi, los equipos de abordaje están preparados para la acción! El generador de {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}campo de Geller{/g} de la Desalmada está frito, así que no podrán saltar a la disformidad, y el motor principal también es pasto de las llamas. Ese montón de chatarra no va a ir a ninguna parte. Podemos iniciar el asalto contra la nave ya mismo, pero la experiencia me dice que esto irá mucho mejor si los ablandamos con un par de impactos precisos. ¿Qué le parece si aplastamos a un puñado de herejes entre las mamparas para facilitarle las cosas, Lord Capi?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g} generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket isn't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capi, los equipos de abordaje están preparados para la acción! El generador de {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}campo de Geller{/g} de la Desalmada está frito, así que no podrán saltar a la disformidad, y el motor principal también es pasto de las llamas. Ese montón de chatarra no va a ir a ninguna parte. Podemos iniciar el asalto contra la nave ya mismo, pero la experiencia me dice que esto irá mucho mejor si los ablandamos con un par de impactos precisos. ¿Qué le parece si aplastamos a un puñado de herejes entre las mamparas para facilitarle las cosas, Lord Capi?».

languages.text: “船长老大，登船小队已经等不及要上了！无心号的{g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}盖勒力场{/g}已经完蛋了，他们甭想往亚空间里钻了。他们的主引擎也变成了烟花，那个破铁桶哪儿都别想去了。咱们确实可以马上动手，但根据我的经验，如果能朝着该打的地方再来上几炮的话，接下来会轻松不少。不如再多炸死几个异端分子，让你接下来的仗好打点，怎么样，船长老大？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g} generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket isn't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，登船小队已经等不及要上了！无心号的{g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}盖勒力场{/g}已经完蛋了，他们甭想往亚空间里钻了。他们的主引擎也变成了烟花，那个破铁桶哪儿都别想去了。咱们确实可以马上动手，但根据我的经验，如果能朝着该打的地方再来上几炮的话，接下来会轻松不少。不如再多炸死几个异端分子，让你接下来的仗好打点，怎么样，船长老大？”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, les équipes d'abordage brûlent d'en découdre ! Le générateur de {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}champ de Geller{/g} du Sans-Cœur est H.S., alors pas de saut Warp pour eux, et on a fait aussi un beau feu d'artifice dans leur moteur principal ! Ce tas de ferraille n'ira nulle part. Nous pouvons dès maintenant donner l'assaut, mais d'après mon expérience, il serait préférable de préparer le terrain avec une ou deux frappes de précision supplémentaires. Que diriez-vous d'aplatir quelques hérétiques entre deux cloisons, histoire de vous faciliter la tâche ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g} generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket isn't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, les équipes d'abordage brûlent d'en découdre ! Le générateur de {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}champ de Geller{/g} du Sans-Cœur est H.S., alors pas de saut Warp pour eux, et on a fait aussi un beau feu d'artifice dans leur moteur principal ! Ce tas de ferraille n'ira nulle part. Nous pouvons dès maintenant donner l'assaut, mais d'après mon expérience, il serait préférable de préparer le terrain avec une ou deux frappes de précision supplémentaires. Que diriez-vous d'aplatir quelques hérétiques entre deux cloisons, histoire de vous faciliter la tâche ? »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、突入チームはもう行きたくてウズウズしています！ハートレスの{g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}ゲラーフィールド{/g}発生装置が故障していて、今は〈歪み〉航行はできませんし、メインエンジンにも花火を仕掛けました。あのボロ船はどこへも行けません。すぐに船への攻撃を開始できますが、経験上、もう少し正確な攻撃を2、3加えた方がもっとスムーズに事が運ぶと思います。隔壁の間の何人かの異端者をぺしゃんこにして、戦闘を容易にするっていうのはどうですか？ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g} generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket isn't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、突入チームはもう行きたくてウズウズしています！ハートレスの{g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}ゲラーフィールド{/g}発生装置が故障していて、今は〈歪み〉航行はできませんし、メインエンジンにも花火を仕掛けました。あのボロ船はどこへも行けません。すぐに船への攻撃を開始できますが、経験上、もう少し正確な攻撃を2、3加えた方がもっとスムーズに事が運ぶと思います。隔壁の間の何人かの異端者をぺしゃんこにして、戦闘を容易にするっていうのはどうですか？ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bordalama ekipleri harekâta hazır! Taşkalp'in {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller alanı{/g} jeneratörü yanmış durumda, artık öteboyuta sıçramaları mümkün değil. Ana tahrik sistemlerinde de patlama meydana geldi. Pas yığını hiçbir yere gidemez. Taarruzu derhâl başlatabiliriz. Gelgelelim tecrübelerim, birkaç isabetli atış daha yaparak işimizi iyice kolaylaştırabileceğimizi söylüyor. Bölme panelleri arasındaki kâfirleri dümdüz edip çatışmayı kolaylaştırmaya ne dersiniz Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g} generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket isn't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, bordalama ekipleri harekâta hazır! Taşkalp'in {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller alanı{/g} jeneratörü yanmış durumda, artık öteboyuta sıçramaları mümkün değil. Ana tahrik sistemlerinde de patlama meydana geldi. Pas yığını hiçbir yere gidemez. Taarruzu derhâl başlatabiliriz. Gelgelelim tecrübelerim, birkaç isabetli atış daha yaparak işimizi iyice kolaylaştırabileceğimizi söylüyor. Bölme panelleri arasındaki kâfirleri dümdüz edip çatışmayı kolaylaştırmaya ne dersiniz Lord Kaptan?"

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, die Entertrupps wollen losschlagen! Der {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Gellerfeld{/g}-Generator der Heartless ist hinüber, in den Warp kommen sie also nicht, und außerdem haben wir ein Feuerwerk in ihrem Hauptantrieb veranstaltet. Dieser rostige Eimer fliegt nirgendwohin. Wir können mit dem Angriff auf das Schiff sofort beginnen, aber erfahrungsgemäß läuft alles deutlich glatter, wenn wir vorher noch einige präzise Nadelstiche setzen. Was haltet Ihr davon, wenn wir zwischen den Schotten einige Ketzer plattmachen, um Euch den Kampf zu erleichtern, Lord Cap'n?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the boarding teams are raring to go! The Heartless's {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g} generator is cooked, so no warp-diving for them now, and we've set off fireworks in their primary drive, too. That rustbucket isn't going anywhere. We can begin the assault on the ship right away, but experience tells me this will go a lot smoother if we deliver just a couple more precise strikes. How about we flatten a few heretics between the bulkheads to make the fighting easier for you, Lord Cap'n?"

Dieser rostige Eimer fliegt nirgendwohin. Was haltet Ihr davon, wenn wir zwischen den Schotten einige Ketzer plattmachen, um Euch den Kampf zu erleichtern, Lord Cap'n?"
